markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Journeybread](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1921)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Journeybread contains a mix of fruits, nuts, and grains with an alchemical boost. Eating one journeybread provides all the food and water you need for a day. If you subsist on nothing else for a week, you become temporarily immune to journeybread until you eat real food and drink water normally for 24 hours.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Journeybread
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Journeybread (Power)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

In addition to the benefits of journeybread, power journeybread grants you a +1 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34), and [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), and to Fortitude saving throws against being [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). The number of minutes you can [Hustle](/Actions.aspx?ID=515) changes to your Constitution modifier × 20. These benefits last for 4 hours.
name: Journeybread (Power)
